meta_prompt_template.template_name: 品牌产品演变史3D信息图生成器
meta_prompt_template.template_description: 用于生成博物馆级品牌产品演变史信息图的通用提示词模板，支持手机、汽车、消费电子等多种产品类别

required_variables.brand_name_cn: 品牌中文名称（如：小米、保时捷）
required_variables.product_category: 产品类别（如：手机、汽车、相机、游戏机等）
required_variables.total_products: 里程碑产品数量（建议12-13款）
required_variables.brand_color_primary: 品牌主色调（如：小米橙铜色、保时捷赛车绿）
required_variables.brand_slogan: 品牌标志性口号（如：为发烧而生、Inspired by Racing）

product_lineup.description: 按时间顺序排列的产品清单，每个产品包含年份、型号、关键特征
product_lineup.example_xiaomi: 2011 Mi 1 (1999元 price tag) → 2012 Mi 2 → 2013 Redmi Note → 2014 Mi 4 (steel frame) → 2016 Mi MIX (bezel-less pioneer) → 2017 Mi 6 → 2019 Mi 9 → 2020 Mi 10 → 2021 Mi 11 Ultra (Leica camera) → 2022 Mi 12S Ultra → 2023 Mi 13 Ultra → 2024 Mi 14 Ultra → 2025 Mi 15 Ultra (AI flagship)
product_lineup.example_porsche: 1948 Porsche 356 (first car) → 1963 Porsche 911 (iconic silhouette) → 1970 Porsche 917 (Le Mans) → 1975 911 Turbo 930 (whale tail) → 1996 Boxster → 1998 911 996 (water-cooled) → 2003 Cayenne (SUV) → 2009 Panamera → 2014 918 Spyder → 2019 Taycan (electric) → 2023 911 Dakar → 2024 911 Hybrid → 2025 Mission X
product_lineup.customization_guide: 根据品牌实际产品线替换，保留关键特征标签

era_divisions.description: 将品牌历史划分为3-5个时代，每个时代包含时间段、标志图标、核心特征

example_porsche.era: 电气化新纪元 2014-2025 (Electric New Era)

header.template: A massive, encyclopedic 16:9 3D infographic poster titled "THE EVOLUTION OF {BRAND_EN} | {BRAND_CN}进化史 {START_YEAR}-{END_YEAR}". The visual style is a high-end fusion of museum-grade {PRODUCT_CATEGORY} photography and complex technical engineering blueprints.

hero_lineup.template:
The Hero Lineup: A complete chronological lineup of {TOTAL_PRODUCTS} iconic {BRAND_EN} {PRODUCT_CATEGORY} arranged horizontally across the center on a {SURFACE_MATERIAL} with {MEASUREMENT_TOOL}:
{PRODUCT_TIMELINE_STRING}
surface_material_options: precision metal measurement scale (科技产品)
polished black marble platform with chrome scale (奢侈品/汽车)
wooden display shelf with brass rulers (复古产品)
hero_lineup.example: precision metal measurement scale | polished black marble platform

rendering_style.template: Rendering: Hyper-realistic 3D, 8k resolution. Emphasis on the evolution of {EVOLUTION_ASPECT}: showing {EARLY_STAGE_DESCRIPTION} vs. {LATE_STAGE_DESCRIPTION}.
rendering_style.example_xiaomi: materials: showing the plastic back cover of early 2011 models vs. the premium ceramic, glass, and titanium finishes with sophisticated camera modules and AI capabilities of 2025 flagship phones
rendering_style.example_porsche: design language: showing the curved simplicity of 1948 356 vs. the aerodynamic sophistication and futuristic electric innovation of 2025 Mission X concept

background_design.template: Background: A deep, rich {COLOR_GRADIENT} gradient textured background ({BRAND_COLOR_CONTEXT}). It is heavily layered with low-opacity watermarks of {BRAND_ELEMENTS_LIST}, with "{START_YEAR}-{END_YEAR}" and "{YEARS_SPAN} YEARS" timeline markers.

brand_elements_examples.tech_company: brand logo evolution, product launch keynote slides, system interface screenshots, store opening photos, IPO newspapers, market share charts
brand_elements_examples.automotive: brand crest evolution, vintage racing posters, technical engine drawings, lap time charts, victory newspapers, iconic colorway samples

header_design.template: Header: The iconic {BRAND_EN} logo displayed at the top center in {LOGO_MATERIAL} 3D relief, with bold {FONT_STYLE} title "THE EVOLUTION OF {BRAND_EN} | {BRAND_CN}进化史 {START_YEAR}-{END_YEAR}" with prominent "{YEARS_SPAN} YEARS" badge.

dense_annotation_network.description: 密集标注网络，连接产品细节与数据说明
dense_annotation_network.template: Hundreds of fine {LINE_COLOR} hairlines connecting design elements ({DESIGN_ELEMENTS_LIST}) to compact text blocks showing {DATA_METRICS_LIST}

customization_checklist: ✓ 替换所有{VARIABLE}为实际品牌信息

✓ 选择匹配的品牌配色方案
✓ 列出关键技术演进指标
✓ 添加品牌独特元素（logo演变、经典色、标志性技术）
✓ 调整风格化参数（realistic vs artistic）

example_filled_prompt.full_prompt:
A massive, encyclopedic 16:9 3D infographic poster titled "THE EVOLUTION OF XIAOMI | 小米手机进化史 2010-2025". The visual style is a high-end fusion of museum-grade smartphone photography and complex technical engineering blueprints.

The Hero Lineup: A complete chronological lineup of 13 iconic Xiaomi smartphones arranged horizontally across the center on a precision metal measurement scale:
2011 Mi 1 (1999元) → 2012 Mi 2 → 2013 Redmi Note → 2014 Mi 4 (steel frame) → 2016 Mi MIX (bezel-less) → 2017 Mi 6 → 2019 Mi 9 → 2020 Mi 10 → 2021 Mi 11 Ultra → 2022 Mi 12S Ultra → 2023 Mi 13 Ultra → 2024 Mi 14 Ultra → 2025 Mi 15 Ultra (AI flagship).

Rendering: Hyper-realistic 3D, 8k resolution. Emphasis on material evolution: plastic 2011 models vs. premium ceramic, glass, titanium 2025 flagships with AI capabilities.

Background: Deep orange-to-copper gradient (Xiaomi's MIUI color). Layered with "为发烧而生" slogan, MIUI interface screenshots, Lei Jun keynotes, India store openings, IPO newspapers, "2010-2025" and "15 YEARS" markers.

Header: Xiaomi "MI" logo in brushed metal 3D relief, bold sans-serif title "THE EVOLUTION OF XIAOMI | 小米手机进化史 2010-2025" with "15 YEARS" badge.

Information Layer:
- Dense white hairlines connecting camera modules, bezels, fingerprint sensors to text blocks showing Snapdragon generations, RAM/ROM, camera MP (8MP→200MP→AI), battery, charging (18W→120W), price, AI features
- Five era modules: "发烧友时代 2011-2013 (Enthusiast Era)" flame icon, "性价比之王 2014-2017 (Value King)" crown icon, "全面屏革命 2018-2020 (Full-Screen Revolution)" screen icon, "高端化征程 2021-2024 (Premium Journey)" mountain icon, "AI智能新纪元 2025 (AI Era)" brain icon
- Magnifying inserts: steel frame texture, ceramic close-up, sensor size evolution, under-display fingerprint, Leica coating, AI neural engine
- Bottom strip: YEAR | MODEL | PROCESSOR | RAM/ROM | CAMERA | BATTERY | CHARGING | PRICE | 二手价值 | AI FEATURES

Floating elements: pop-up camera patents, global expansion map (China/India/Europe), MIUI→HyperOS evolution tree, market share chart, IoT/EV/Smart Home ecosystem, sustainability milestones.

Technical Specs: Octane render, Unreal Engine 5, editorial layout, volumetric lighting, sharp focus, consumer electronics color grading, museum quality with holographic AI elements for 2025. --ar 16:9 --v 6.0 --stylize 300

color_psychology.orange/copper: 创新、活力、科技感（小米、华为）
color_psychology.racing_green: 传承、赛道、奢华（保时捷、捷豹）
color_psychology.electric_blue: 未来、电动、智能（特斯拉、蔚来）

visual_hierarchy.primary_focus: 中央产品阵容（最大、最清晰）
visual_hierarchy.secondary_focus: 时代划分模块（中等大小、浮动）
visual_hierarchy.tertiary_details: 技术标注、数据条、漂浮元素（细节、辅助）

storytelling_elements.emotional_anchors: 价格标签（1999元）、里程碑事件（勒芒冠军）、粉丝文化（钉子户）、技术突破（卫星通信）
storytelling_elements.nostalgia_triggers: 早期产品设计、经典配色、标志性广告语、时代背景元素
storytelling_elements.future_vision: 最新产品的科幻感、全息效果、概念车特写

technical_accuracy.research_requirements: 产品发布时间、准确规格参数、历史里程碑事件、市场数据
technical_accuracy.fact_checking: 处理器型号、相机规格、价格信息、销量数据、赛事成绩
technical_accuracy.citation_elements: 在背景水印中嵌入新闻报道、官方数据、权威认证
